recipe.title: One-Pan Teriyaki Salmon Dinner Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¾ cup ; brown sugar, packed ; (165 g)

steps.step: On a baking sheet, combine broccoli, carrots, oil, salt, and pepper.
Mix thoroughly to make sure all vegetables are coated, and then arrange them in the center of the tray in a flat layer.
Lay the two salmon fillets on the vegetables.
In a medium bowl, combine brown sugar, soy sauce, honey, and sesame seeds. Mix until there are no lumps.
Spread the glaze evenly on top of the two salmon fillets.
Take the salmon fillets off the vegetables and set aside. Toss the vegetables in the roasting juices.
Glaze the salmon with any remaining juices. Serve!

steps_updated.steps_updated: On a baking sheet, combine broccoli, carrots, oil, salt, and pepper.
Mix thoroughly to make sure all vegetables are coated, and then arrange them in the center of the tray in a flat layer.
Lay the two salmon fillets on the vegetables.
In a medium bowl, combine brown sugar, soy sauce, honey, and sesame seeds.
Mix until there are no lumps.
Spread the glaze evenly on top of the two salmon fillets.
Take the salmon fillets off the vegetables and set aside.
Toss the vegetables in the roasting juices.
Glaze the salmon with any remaining juices.
